column4: France's Technicolor to buy Cisco's set-top box business
column5: PARIS French media and entertainment technology group Technicolor will buy Cisco System's home video equipment business for 550 million euros ($602 million)  it said on Thursday  sending its shares to a five-year high.

column4: Qualcomm's potential break-up could lead to courtship with Intel
column5: Wall Street says Intel Corp is the best suitor for Qualcomm Inc's chip unit  if the maker of Snapdragon mobile processors decides to break itself up.

column4: French Technicolor to buy Cisco connected devices unit for $602 mln
